attributes.action: change the tax system to include all nondomicile and remove citizenship of all who change residence to avoid tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the tax havens of the rich should be fought with the same endevour as the terrorist there should be no exceptions to allow individuals enough funds to finance private wars this should be a world incentive to remove the power of these super rich.a sum should be set on the wealth of any individual or corporation above which only governments can go.
